def solve(arr, pos):
    return arr[:pos][::-1] + arr[pos:]

def solve(arr, pos):
    left = 0
    right = pos - 1
    
    while left < right:
        temp = arr[left]
        arr[left] = arr[right]
        arr[right] = temp
        left += 1
        right -= 1
        
    return arr

def solve(arr, pos):
    return arr[:pos][::-1] + arr[pos:]
